bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Assessment of Geological Stability of Transmission Corridors
IEEE Draft Guide for Assessment of Geological Stability of Transmission Corridors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Geological hazard survey and monitoring for transmission corridors are introduced in this guide. Geological stability assessment for transmission corridors is discussed, including assessment principles, assessment process, assessment methods and indexes.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
